property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Zurgo Helmsmasher attacks each combat if able. Zurgo Helmsmasher has indestructible as long as it's your turn. Whenever a creature dealt damage by Zurgo Helmsmasher this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Zurgo Helmsmasher.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Swords, to me! We must engage their line to protect our archers and mages. Let no one fail this task!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Leonin Snarecaster enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Formerly oppressed by the polis of Meletis, leonin occasionally "mistake" their old enemies for game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every once in a while, when they aren't getting incinerated in lava, crushed under rock slides, or devoured by dragons, goblins experience moments of unmitigated glory in battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste and attack each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't let him lead the soldiers, but by all means let him lead the way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblins you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hell's Thunder. Unearth {4}{R} ({4}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Kathari Bomber deals combat damage to a player, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens and sacrifice Kathari Bomber. Unearth {3}{B}{R} ({3}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shambling Remains can't block. Unearth {B}{R} ({B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid - When Mardu Heart-Piercer enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, Mardu Heart-Piercer deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who have never ridden before the wind do not know the true joy of war."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens, where X is the number of Goblins you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He displays a perverse charisma fueled by avarice. Highly dangerous. Recommend civil sanctions." - Agmand Sarv, Azorius hussar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ogres are driven by passion, rage, and another ogre standing behind them with a whip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Flame-Kin Zealot enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boros soldiers are like a cache of bombs ready to explode, and the flame-kin light their fuses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Scourge Devil enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Unearth {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, return a red creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oni leapt easily from peak to peak, toying with its victims, its voice a purr from the rumbling depths of nightmare.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The climax of a warlord's career is always death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The beauty of it is they never see it coming. Ever." - Razzix, sparkmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arc Trail deals 2 damage to any target and 1 damage to another target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't try to hit your enemies. Concentrate on the space between them, and fill the air with doom." - Spear-Tribe teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With one motion, a pest is removed and a scourge inflicted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins are eager to follow orders, especially when those orders involve stealing, hurting, annoying, eating, destroying, or swearing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The people of Akros must learn from our leonin adversaries. If we match their staunch ferocity with our superior faith, we cannot fail." - Cymede, queen of Akros

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orcish Cannonade deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crispy! Scarback! Load another volcano-ball." - Stumphobbler Thuj, orcish captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature. Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile two red cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banefire deals X damage to any target. If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ghitu Encampment enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {1}{R}: Ghitu Encampment becomes a 2/1 red Warrior creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nomad Outpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the weak imprison themselves behind walls. We live free under the wind, and our freedom makes us strong." - Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw three cards. {2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not concern yourself with my origin, my race, or my ancestry. Seek my record in the pits, and then make your wager."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Faerie Impostor enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many Tin Street shops display a sign on the door: "No cloaks allowed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Coral Trickster is turned face up, you may tap or untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They wait in darkened depths, laughing eagerly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph - Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Jeskai Elder deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sparkmages are performance artists of sorts, but pain is the price of admission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Echo Tracer is turned face up, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Stonecloaker enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand. When Stonecloaker enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Aquamorph Entity enters the battlefield or is turned face up, it becomes your choice of 5/1 or 1/5. Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You think no one is watching, you think you're smart enough to escape, and most foolish of all, you think no one cares." - Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Small enough to penetrate the narrowest crack in a castle wall and numerous enough to hack apart a griffin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Thousand Winds is turned face up, return all other tapped creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first spell taught to young mages, it has spared the lives of many whose hands are too small to hold a sword.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Having conviction is more important than being righteous." - Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You call it luck. I call it preparation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocking creatures get +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forgive me, Master Kami, but in the interest of my people I must halt your advance."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you've been dealt damage by two or more creatures this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Inferno Trap deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keranos is a fickle god, delivering punishment as readily as prophecy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent had two or more creatures enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If four or more creatures are attacking, you may pay {1}{W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Arrow Volley Trap deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be." - Agosto, Azorius imperator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mystic Monastery enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When asked how many paths reach enlightenment, the monk kicked a heap of sand. "Count," he smiled, "and then find more grains."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.
